track_strategy: Brake later but manage entry stability, applying progressive throttle on traction-limited exits to control rear surface temperatures. In the event of a 10°C track temperature increase, extend lift-and-coast; for a 10°C decrease, be aggressive to build core temperature and prevent graining. For weather deterioration, report surface water levels and prepare for a switch to intermediate compounds. If degradation exceeds the predicted curve, initiate tire-saving protocols such as short-shifting and be prepared to bring the pit window forward.
